<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she stood up <S%G461>straight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1279>went<s%> on his way <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>traveling<s%> <S%G4197><s%> on <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
